text: @Liberaler_AI"Foundation metrics for evaluating effectiveness of healthcare conversations powered by generative AI" - this is music to my ears! It's high time we assess the efficacy of these chatbots from the user's perspective. Kudos to you for prioritizing the comparison of models based on various metrics. Trustworthiness is, indeed, a crucial aspect of Responsible AI in healthcare. Let's ensure that the responses provided are reliable and conscientious. Can't wait to see the leaderboard! ðŸš€ðŸ’»
